scripts.screenshots: npm run check:imports && playwright test tests/visual/screenshots.spec.ts --project=chromium && npm run zip:visuals
scripts.screenshots:headed: npm run check:imports && playwright test tests/visual/screenshots.spec.ts --project=chromium --headed && npm run zip:visuals
scripts.screenshots:archive-rebuild: npm run screenshots:clean && npm run screenshots
scripts.screenshots:prod: npm run screenshots:clean && npm run check:imports && playwright test tests/visual/screenshots.spec.ts --project=chromium
scripts.screenshots:prod:headed: npm run screenshots:clean && npm run check:imports && playwright test tests/visual/screenshots.spec.ts --project=chromium --headed
scripts.screenshots:prod:archive: npm run screenshots:clean && npm run screenshots
scripts.screenshots:prod:archive-headed: npm run screenshots:clean && npm run screenshots:headed
scripts.screenshots:prod:ci: node -e "if(!process.env.PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL){console.error('‚ùå Missing PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL');process.exit(1)}" && npm run screenshots:prod
scripts.gallery: npm run check:imports && playwright test tests/visual/gallery.spec.ts --project=chromium && npm run zip:visuals
scripts.screenshots+mic: npm run screenshots && npm run test:mic && npm run zip:results
scripts.gallery+mic: npm run gallery && npm run test:mic && npm run zip:results
scripts.zip:visuals: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$ts = Get-Date -Format yyyyMMdd_HHmmss; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path 'tests/__artifacts__' | Out-Null; if (Test-Path 'docs/visuals') { Compress-Archive -Path 'docs/visuals/*' -DestinationPath ('tests/__artifacts__/visuals_' + $ts + '.zip') -Force }; if (Test-Path 'playwright-report') { Compress-Archive -Path 'playwright-report/*' -DestinationPath ('tests/__artifacts__/report_' + $ts + '.zip') -Force }"
scripts.zip:results: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$ts = Get-Date -Format yyyyMMdd_HHmmss; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path 'tests/__artifacts__' | Out-Null; if (Test-Path 'test-results') { Compress-Archive -Path 'test-results/*' -DestinationPath ('tests/__artifacts__/e2e_' + $ts + '.zip') -Force }"
